Name: MKZ
Review Text:
My absolute favorite place in Amsterdam.
The mere existence of this project, and the amazing people who make it, makes my heart happier and transformed my connection with the city. â€¦

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Awesome place, awesome people, awesome food. Everything is so delicious and the joint is super laid back. Come here for good vegan food!

Name: MKZ
Review Text:
Excellent vegan place. it is a nonprofit run by volunteers.
We went on a night when for 5 euro you get 3 course set menu. It might always be this way. â€¦

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Top vegan place, love it. Hard to reserve, but try, opens only on the weekends (check their agenda) very casual and different from a classic restaurant, the MKZ dinners are prepared by collectives. And always, always amazing. Beer selection is good, wines not really. ;)

Name: MKZ
Review Text: On Wednesdays and Fridays they offer a vegan dinner. For 5â‚¬ you get the whole menu (starter, main dish, dessert). You can have more bread if you need it of course :). You have to wash your dishes after you're done. And that's it. The place is lovely, people are the best, and they have a good selection of drinks also.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Great volunteer run restaurant with an outstanding mission & vision. Vegan food should be cheaper than non-vegan and these guys are showing how that's done with 3 course meals for just 5 Euro! Plus 1,5 Euro bottles beers!!

Name: MKZ
Review Text: This place is amazing. There is a big family atmosphere here and they make everyone feel welcome. I went on a Saturday and it was pay what you want, the money goes to a cause, you serve yourself, wash the plate, and they then serve you the next portion. It's fantastic ðŸ‘Œ

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Great vegan food for next to nothing! You usually get a soup for starters, then a hearty, tasty main course and an amazing (often raw chocolate) desert. That's right, a three-course meal for just 5 euro! Beers 1,50 euro.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: So happy we went there. Great atmosphere, nice people but most importantly -amazing vegan food for only 5 euros. Thank you everyone for organizing this.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Great place! Cosy and relaxed. Don't come here looking for a fancy meal....cone here looking for a chilled out place with warm vibes. Food is nice...and cheap. Remember,  you need to wash your own dishes :-)

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Great alternative place, amazing people that are working for good causes, friendly atmosphere. Great food of course, but this place is so much more than just a place to eat. You have to go and find out for yourself :) Enjoy !

Name: MKZ
Review Text: If you're in Amsterdam and looking for a vegan meal served in an anarchist squat coop kitchen, then head out to MKZ on the Southwest side near Vondelpark. Call around 2:30 to make reservations, or if want to find out if you can volunteer

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Simply amazing. No hassle with picking food, since there's only 1 dish per round. This one dish however... If you're reading this, go there :)

Name: MKZ
Review Text: non profit vegan place, with great loving people working there, nice food, very cheap and great atmosphere!, also a good start for people to get to know a bit whats happening in amsterdam underground and meet some nice new people ! <3 it :)

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Cheap food, great atmosphere, friendly people, always new meals to try, completely D.I.Y. Love it! Highly recommend!

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Fantastic little find with quality vegan food where there is a suggested donation and you pay what you feel. Nice vibe with down to earth staff

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Such a great idea and place. Keep it up! Enjoyed really good fresh food and was amazed with the co-working of everyone.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Multi-course vegan meal for 5 euro. Can't beat that. Very DIY, come with an open mind.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Delicious vegan food, nice drinks and mostly... interesting people to talk to.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: All the vegan people must try out this place is friendly, calm yet cozy

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Cheap, lovely vibe nice staff, really nicely made food too!

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Fantastic vegetarian food, fantastic people amazing experience.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Very attending and kind staff. Interesting interior. Great to hang out with groups.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Good atmosphere, good food, good prices indeed

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Perfect place to have a cheap, vegan dinner.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: amazing vibe, great value for money! great stuff

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Good place for Thursday evenings for hungry people low on cash.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Went for a open house and loved it!

Name: MKZ
Review Text: The food is delicious.

Name: MKZ
Review Text: Love iiiit

Name: MKZ
Review Text: An awesome place, good vibes, amazing food!
